projects.title: FOMS - Enterprise Order Management Platform
projects.description: Enterprise-level vehicle order management system for federal GSA contracts
projects.longDescription: FOMS is a comprehensive order management platform developed for a major motor company's Marketing and Sales division, enabling complete lifecycle management of vehicle orders submitted through the General Services Administration (GSA). The system handles abstract maintenance, MVDO processing, order inquiries, and automated report generation, ensuring seamless and efficient handling of federal vehicle orders.
highlights: Designed and maintained robust RESTful APIs and microservices with focus on scalability and security
Implemented asynchronous communication using RabbitMQ and Kafka for reliable microservice interaction
Developed and maintained React-TypeScript frontend components enhancing performance and user engagement
Created comprehensive JUnit and integration test suites ensuring code reliability and continuous integration
Collaborated with DevOps teams on deployment across environments using Jenkins, Kubernetes, and Azure services
Coordinated with QA team using systematic root cause analysis to enhance application stability

projects.title: VSO - Dealer Special Orders Platform
projects.description: Specialized configuration and pricing platform for customized fleet requirements
projects.longDescription: VSO is a specialized configuration and pricing platform designed to manage Dealer Special Orders, including police vehicles, ambulances, and other customized fleet requirements. The application provides end-to-end capabilities for VSO option inquiry, option maintenance, and accurate pricing. It integrates with OPS and downstream systems via the SODDB interface, ensuring validated configurations and smooth data flow across the order processing ecosystem.
highlights: Architected microservices for configuration management and pricing calculations
Implemented real-time messaging with RabbitMQ and Kafka for order processing
Developed React-TypeScript UI for option inquiry and maintenance workflows
Integrated with OPS and SODDB interface for validated configurations
Implemented multithreading for concurrent order processing and pricing
Deployed on GCP Cloud Run and Azure AKS with monitoring via Datadog

projects.title: Crime Information Management System
projects.description: Admin system for managing crime and criminal information with public search features
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive crime information management platform where administrators can manage crime and criminal records efficiently. The system provides an intuitive admin interface for CRUD operations on crime and criminal data with assignment capabilities. Public users can search for criminals by name, search crimes by description, and view crime statistics for specific date ranges.
highlights: Developed comprehensive admin dashboard for managing crime and criminal records
Implemented role-based access control with separate admin and public user features
Created search functionality for criminals by name and crimes by description
Built crime statistics reporting with date range filtering
Designed secure login system for admin authentication
Completed individual project in 5 days with full CRUD operations using core Java

projects.title: Online Cab Booking Application
projects.description: REST API-driven cab booking platform with user and admin management
projects.longDescription: A full-featured online cab booking application that provides comprehensive REST API services for booking cabs and managing users with two distinct roles: Admin and User. The system handles user authentication, cab booking management, and driver management with interactive API services. Admins can manage users, cab drivers, and vehicle information, while users can book cabs seamlessly.
highlights: Built user authentication with login and signin functionality for seamless cab booking
Created Driver entity with comprehensive JPA mapping and relationships
Implemented admin APIs for registering, retrieving, updating, and deleting drivers
Developed driver ranking and best drivers list functionality for better recommendations
Integrated Swagger for comprehensive API documentation and testing
Collaborated with 4-member team to deliver project in 6 days
